FUNCTION_BLOCK FINAL OutstationConfigurationCOM EXTENDS
OutstationConfiguration
IMPLEMENTS IOutstationConfigurationCOM
Function block representing an Outstation COM configuration.
An Outstation needs to be configured regarding its
outstation address
optional validate a given master address
either IP- or COM-settings

BOOL
FALSE
Enable or disable the unsolicited responses using a default configuration represented by defaults provided by CmpDNP3OutstationSessionConfigUnsolicitedResponse.
If disabled the client will not be able to enable them.

rows:
Validate the master address. This allows only the master
with âmasterAddressâ a connection.
The master address which is allowed to connect.

Enable or disable the unsolicited responses using a default configuration represented by defaults provided by CmpDNP3OutstationSessionConfigUnsolicitedResponse.
If disabled the client will not be able to enable them.

The Timeout is the TIME between two received or sent
characters until the read or write operation will return.
